alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:26PM EDT until June 14 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 926 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Tallahassee to near Florida A and M to 16 miles southwest of Midway, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Goose Pasture, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport and Arran. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
